rawContent:
# Project Overview

[project]
id = "llm-boilerplate"
name = "LLM Boilerplate"
type = "application"
description = """
File-driven specification system for LLM-assisted development.
All project knowledge lives in Markdown and TOML files.
"""

[features]
list = [
  "Adaptive workflow (Simple/Medium/Complex profiles)",
  "Structured layers: entities, roles, guards, routes, use-cases, components",
  "Multi-platform support (web-app, admin-panel, mobile, API)",
  "Event system with visual feedback and toast notifications",
  "Auto-generated documentation from TOML specs",
  "Working React prototype with mock data and localStorage persistence",
  "Prisma schema generation from entity definitions",
  "LLM/RAG integration via manifest.json",
]

[owner]
name = "LLM Boilerplate Team"
email = "team@llm-boilerplate.dev"
